frame.name: Locale_by_characteristic_entity
frame.definition:
<def-root>A <fen>Locale</fen> is characterized by the type of entity associated with the <fen>Locale</fen>. Some words specifically denote regions characterized by the individuals who typically live or work there. Typcial such <fen>Characteristic</fen>s include ethnicity, national origin, language, and other shared cultural traits.
<ex>This neighborhood started out as a <fex name="cha">Russian</fex> <t><fex name="loc">enclave</fex></t>.</ex>
<ex>A twenty-minute walk will take you to the <fex name="cha">Dutch-speaking</fex> <t><fex name="loc">quarter</fex></t> <fex name="Container_possessor">of the city</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Locale
FE.definition:
<def-root>A stable bounded area characterized by properties of the entities who are typically located there (e.g., work and/or live there).
<ex>A twenty-minute walk will take you to the Dutch-speaking <t><fex name="loc">quarter</fex></t> of the city.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Relative_location
FE.definition:
<def-root>A place that a <fen>Locale</fen> is located with respect to.
<ex>Residents of the suburban <t>enclave</t> <fex name="rel">near downtown</fex> have started their own little rebellion.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Formational_cause
FE.definition: <def-root>Indicates the action (or causer) which brings the features of the <fen>Locale</fen> about. This FE should also include words that indicate that there was no salient formation.</def-root>

FE.name: Container_possessor
FE.definition:
<def-root>The larger area within which the <fen>Locale</fen> is located.
<ex>A twenty-minute walk will take you to the Dutch-speaking <t>quarter</t> <fex name="ContP">of the city</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition: <def-root>The Descriptor is a temporary condition of the <fen>Locale</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Related_event
FE.definition: <def-root>An event related to the locale in some way other than (1) Formational_cause (which is a separate FE) or an intended use (which would place the instance in Locale_by_use), or (3) a defining event (which would place the instance in Locale_by_event).</def-root>

FE.name: Inherent_purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>The activity that is carried out in the <fen>Locale</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Characteristic
FE.definition:
<def-root>A property or characteristic of the entities in the <fen>Locale</fen>.
<ex>A twenty-minute walk will take you to the <fex name="cha">Dutch-speaking</fex> <t>quarter</t> of the city.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: quarter.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a part of town characterized by the people who live or work there.

lexUnit.name: enclave.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a region relatively separated from surrounding regions, characterized by the presence of certain types of people.

lexUnit.name: belt.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: an elongated region characterized by the entities or activities carried out in the region.
